text: But you gotta understand that there ain't no gettin' offa this train we're on, till we get to the end of the line.
Words aren't the only way to tell someone how you feel.
I had a dream, too. It wasn't nice, though... I dreamt I was a moron.
How do you prove that you exist...? Maybe we don't exist...
This is it. This... is your story. It all begins here.
Now is the time to choose! Die and be free of pain, or live and fight your sorrow! Now is the time to shape your stories! Your fate is in your hands!
We live to make the impossible possible. That is our Focus!
If you change the future, you change the past. The effects ripple outwards, up and down the timeline.
I fight to give people hope!
A smile better suits a hero.
That's it! I've come up with a new recipe!
The only fantasy here is yours, and we shall be its final witness.
